dt: {bc}words or language having no meaning or conveying no {d_link|intelligible|intelligible} ideas

dt.t: "And the mome raths outgrabe" is pure {wi}nonsense{/wi}.

dt: {bc}language, conduct, or an idea that is absurd or contrary to good sense

dt.t: To regard the struggle for existence as tragic, however, is logical {wi}nonsense{/wi}.
Today's teenagers are … sharp observers of the {wi}nonsenses{/wi} of adult life and society …
the raincoats are classic, without any {wi}nonsense{/wi}
The teacher tolerated no {wi}nonsense{/wi} in her classroom.

dt: {bc}genetic information consisting of one or more {d_link|codons|codon} that do not code for any {d_link|amino acid|amino acid} and usually cause termination of the molecular chain in protein synthesis {dx_def}see {dxt|synthesis||1}{/dx_def}

shortdef: words or language having no meaning or conveying no intelligible ideas
language, conduct, or an idea that is absurd or contrary to good sense
